name: LUCKY DAY (itch) (JORDAN)
description:
a short visual novel where you have a lucky day (-:

After a series of unlucky events, everything takes a turn for the better as you have one lucky day after the other. Despite the lucky streak you're having, you find out that it might just be too good to be true..

features:
  • gender-neutral protagonist w/ a customizable name 
  • seven endings + true ending w/ 8.6k words total
  • yandere character
  • lucky days
warnings:
  • stalking
  • blood
  • physical violence
  • attempted murder

this game serves as a prequel to my previous game, Dr. Morgan's Counseling Session, however it is not a required read to understand and enjoy this novel (:

Additional Information

lucky day is a free game but if you wish to support me you can donate to me on ko-fi. but honestly the fact you took the time to download and play is more than enough and means the world to me (-: later on ill enable donations on itch.io but not right now ^^

questions, comments, concerns, or criticisms? feel free to send them my way on retrospring or tumblr! 

Special Thanks

a very special thank you to my buddy evan for composing the main music tracks featured in the game and thank you to my friends shannie, stella, and hyphs for proofreading and giving criticism. shout out to stella specifically because she told me about yandere game jam 2023 and it motivated me to actually work on this game lol...
